includes/process_contact.php:
<?php
// Set error reporting
error_reporting(E_ALL);
ini_set('display_errors', 1);

// Check if the form was submitted
if ($_SERVER["REQUEST_METHOD"] == "POST") {
    // Get form data and sanitize inputs
    $name = isset($_POST['name']) ? htmlspecialchars(trim($_POST['name'])) : '';
    $email = isset($_POST['email']) ? filter_var(trim($_POST['email']), FILTER_SANITIZE_EMAIL) : '';
    $subject = isset($_POST['subject']) ? htmlspecialchars(trim($_POST['subject'])) : '';
    $message = isset($_POST['message']) ? htmlspecialchars(trim($_POST['message'])) : '';
    
    // Validate inputs
    $errors = [];
    
    if (empty($name)) {
        $errors[] = "Name is required";
    }
    
    if (empty($email) || !filter_var($email, FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL)) {
        $errors[] = "Valid email is required";
    }
    
    if (empty($subject)) {
        $errors[] = "Subject is required";
    }
    
    if (empty($message)) {
        $errors[] = "Message is required";
    }
    
    // If no errors, process the form
    if (empty($errors)) {
        // Create messages directory if it doesn't exist
        $messagesDir = dirname(__DIR__) . '/messages';
        
        if (!file_exists($messagesDir)) {
            mkdir($messagesDir, 0755, true);
        }
        
        // Create a unique filename for this message
        $timestamp = date('Y-m-d_H-i-s');
        $filename = $messagesDir . '/message_' . $timestamp . '_' . md5($email) . '.txt';
        
        // Format the message content
        $formattedMessage = "";
        $formattedMessage .= "Date: " . date('Y-m-d H:i:s') . "\n";
        $formattedMessage .= "Name: " . $name . "\n";
        $formattedMessage .= "Email: " . $email . "\n";
        $formattedMessage .= "Subject: " . $subject . "\n";
        $formattedMessage .= "Message:\n" . $message . "\n";
        $formattedMessage .= "IP Address: " . $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'] . "\n";
        
        // Write the message to a file
        if (file_put_contents($filename, $formattedMessage)) {
            // Redirect back to contact page with success message
            header('Location: ../contact.php?status=success');
            exit;
        } else {
            // If unable to write to file
            $errors[] = "Unable to save your message. Please try again later.";
        }
    }
    
    // If there are errors, redirect back with error messages
    if (!empty($errors)) {
        $errorString = implode("\n", $errors);
        header('Location: ../contact.php?status=error&message=' . urlencode($errorString));
        exit;
    }
} else {
    // If accessed directly without POST data
    header('Location: ../contact.php');
    exit;
}
